ehi jathika sanwidhayaka namal karunarathna dambaulla pradeshaye ada (21) pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin me bawa kiya sitiyeya.ehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwu ee mahatha,2013 wasare sita aarambha kala wasarakata ru biliyana 1 .6ka mudalak ekathu wu jathika rakshana bhara aramudala yatathe pawathi waga badu aramudale koti 600ka mudalata me wanawita siduwi aththe kumakda yanna wahama rajaya janathawata danum diya yuthu bawath, me aramudale thibunu mudal koti 150k hara ithiri mudal athurudan wi thibena bawath thaman wagakimen yuthuwa helidaraw karana bawa samastha lanka gowijana sammelanaye jathika sanwidhayaka namal karunarathna mahatha pawasayi.danata gowinta labadena waga hani sadahawu masakata gewana ru 10000ka wandiyen ru 1350ka mudalak rakshanayakata bawa pawasa kapa ganna bawath, heli karamin kiwe ema mudala kapa ganima wahama nawatha gowin wenuwen 2013 wasare rajaya ayawaya mangin kriyathmaka kala waga badu aramudalin gowinta gewana lesada kiweya.mudal amathyanshaya yatathe kriyathmaka wana jathika rakshana bhara aramudala gowinge waga hani wenuwen sthapitha kota athi aramudalak bawath, me aramudalata rajya ha pudgalika mulya aayathanawalin warshika aadayamen wasarakata siyata 01 bangin ayakara gena sadum lath aramudalak bawa kiweya.me aramudalin waga wandi gewimata gowijana rakshana mandalayen ru koti 450ka mudalak illa thibena bawath, ema aramudale aththe rupiyal koti 150k pamanak bawa danum di thibena bawada ee mahatha pawasiya.
